name: player career year with week splits
description: Test case for career year column with week splits (same value per week in season)
expected_query: with "base_years" as (SELECT unnest(ARRAY[2023]) as year), "player_years" as (SELECT DISTINCT player.pid, base_years.year FROM player CROSS JOIN base_years), "player_years_weeks" as (SELECT player_years.pid, nfl_year_week_timestamp.year, nfl_year_week_timestamp.week FROM player_years INNER JOIN nfl_year_week_timestamp ON player_years.year = nfl_year_week_timestamp.year WHERE nfl_year_week_timestamp.year = 2023) select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095.career_year as career_year_0, "player_years"."year", "player_years_weeks"."week", "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "player_years" on "player_years"."pid" = "player"."pid" inner join "player_years_weeks" on "player_years_weeks"."pid" = "player"."pid" and "player_years_weeks"."year" = "player_years"."year" inner join "player_seasonlogs" as "t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166" on "t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166"."pid" = "player"."pid" and t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166.year = player_years.year and t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166.seas_type = 'REG' left join "player_seasonlogs" as "t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095" on "t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095"."pid" = "player"."pid" and "t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095"."year" = 2023 and t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095.seas_type = 'REG' where t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166.career_year = '1' group by player.fname, player.lname, t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095.career_year, "player_years"."year", "player_years_weeks"."week", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by "player"."pid" asc limit 10
